text: @AmitShah @narendramodi Sir our PM Narendra Bhai Modi is dealing extraordinary with COVID19 and looking towards his efforts, by providing medicines and other facilities,to other countries without considering cast,creed,colour & religion his name should be recommended for "The Noble Peace Prise Award".
